column2: Facebook Oversight Board continues ban of Previous Guy!
column5: The Facebook Oversight Board sustained the ban on Trump â€”Â for now. Apparently self-regulation might work at least for another six months with marginally less Trump disinformation. But Trump could still return to Facebook. So still the feds should audit Facebook regardless of its oversight board decision on previous guy.  Facebook Oversight Board rules to permanently ban Trump's account https://t.co/SMpwGEqsVm via @businessinsider It's a monumental development that comes after Trump was indefinitely banned from Facebook Twitter and other social media platforms following the deadly Capitol siege on January 6 which he's beenÂ accused of inciting. Per the board's rules Facebook has seven days to enforce to board's binding decision on the content in question. The board's decision cannot be overruled by any employees including Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg. www.businessinsider.com/...  Facebook's Oversight Board will not allow Trump back on the site for now. Nothing has changed since he was banned; indeed he has habitually reaffirmed the Big Lie that the election was stolen and denied his own role in setting off the violent riot that left five people dead and injured scores more. Why then would Facebook which claims to patrol for hate speech and dangerous disinformation let him back on?Â The PostÂ recounts what the companyâ€™s chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said when the former president was banned for praising the violent insurrectionists as â€œpatriotsâ€ and â€œspecialâ€:   Is Facebook waiting for him to incite theÂ nextÂ riot before really absolutely banning him for good? www.washingtonpost.com/â€¦ Facebook â€œoversightâ€ board is a made for media thing like the rose ceremony on the bachelor. Conspiracy theories about the election have proliferated across the country even before President Joe Bidenâ€™s victory but have had particular staying power in Arizona. https://t.co/d9vVhtRhVF  Judge rejects attempt to keep secret the procedures used for Arizona election audit https://t.co/f3rJF8GJQQ   But the lie of a stolen election is the foundational falsehood of a political worldview. Believing it requires Trumpâ€™s followers to affirm the existence of a nationwide plot against him and his supporters â€” a plot led by ruthless Democrats and traitorous Republicans and ignored or endorsed by useless courts and a complicit media. The claimâ€™sÂ plausibility is not the point. Does it really make sense that Attorney General William P. Barr who foundÂ no evidence of election fraudÂ that could have changed the result was in on the plot? Were the conservative judges Trump appointed whoÂ dismissed his rubbish lawsuitsÂ really out to get him? Such considerations donâ€™t seem to matter.
